definition: solely engrossed in one thing/just (one thing, no need to worry about the rest)/simply/by all means/please feel free/do not hesitate (to ask for sth)
only/merely/just/but
grain that has begun to ripen/variant of 衹|只[zhi3]
variant of 只[zhi3]
variant of 只[zhi3]
classifier for birds and certain animals, one of a pair, some utensils, vessels etc
variant of 管[guan3]
surname Guan

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: Pround since nobles tend to; he is nervous to see me.
sentences.chinese: 这些贵族只管即便傲岸，他却畏怯见到我。

sentences.english: Do whatever you can today, then continue on tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 今天，只管做你能做的，接着明天继续。

sentences.english: Of course I shoved an 8-year old kid out of the way so I could play with it.
sentences.chinese: 当然我只管一个8岁的孩子走出了我可以发挥的地方。

sentences.english: Although their juices had run dry, the leaves still exuded a pleasant aroma.
sentences.chinese: 只管已干涸，落叶仍披发出好闻的喷香味。

sentences.english: Most American businesses are only open five days a week.
sentences.chinese: 美国的大多数行业只管业五天。

sentences.english: But the Lord said to Ananias, 'Go!
sentences.chinese: 主对亚拿尼亚说，你只管去。

sentences.english: Then you just go get dressed.
sentences.chinese: 然后你就只管找衣服穿去。

sentences.english: Just look to the stars and beyond.
You might be dead tomorrow, so you might as well enjoy this meat while you have it.
sentences.chinese: 明天我们可能都要死了，现在有肉吃，就只管吃吧。

sentences.english: We cannot wait for the fruit to ripen, but insist on plucking it while it is green.
sentences.chinese: 我们不能等果子成熟，只管把青色的果子采下来。

sentences.english: Just put what you want in the trolley.
sentences.chinese: 你只管把要买的放进来。

sentences.english: Be sure to allocate this land to Israel for an inheritance, as I have instructed you
sentences.chinese: 你只管照我所吩咐的，将这地拈阄分给以色列人为业。

sentences.english: Just take yourself out of the situation.
Just go about your work as if nothing had happened.
sentences.chinese: 只管干你的工作，就象什么事也没有发生过。

sentences.english: Lay your cards on the table regarding your personal direction.
sentences.chinese: 关于你的人生方向，只管把话挑明。

sentences.english: I'll keep my eye on the warning lights.
sentences.chinese: 我照看警报灯，你只管飞行。

definition: no matter (who, what etc)
to know the score (idiom)/to be well aware of the situation
no harm (in doing it)/One might as well./It won't hurt./no matter/it's no bother
all/without any exceptions/categorically
to tell/to instruct/to command
to worry about
to take a lot of trouble (over sb or sth)/may I trouble you (to do sth)
unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
important/urgent
objection/differing opinion
to have no right or ability to interfere in sth/it's none of your business!
to pay no attention to/to disregard/to ignore/to let go unpunished/to let off
to decide/to make decisions/to take responsibility (for deciding)/to be in charge/to give sb justice
I/me/my/(often used in early vernacular literature)
I/me/we/my home/our house
we/us (archaic)
to do as one sees fit/to play it by ear (according to the circumstances)
